Posts.EditableText:
Steps to take:

1) click on link in this page
2) pop-up appears
3) click on web-page
4) hit the escape and then backspace keys
5) hit 'ok' one or maybe two times (since the webpage has changed, the javascript is no longer valid).

This works on Linux Firefox V 2.0.0.10
I'm half-betting it's also valid in Windows Firefox.

And I'm just going to expect IE doesn't.
